parser

Class VarList

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.VarList

  • public class VarList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store information about the set of variables in a PRISM model. Assumes that any constants in the model have been given fixed values. Thus, initial/min/max values for all variables are known. VarList also takes care of how each variable will be encoded to an integer (e.g. for (MT)BDD representation).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  VarList.Var
      Class to store information about a single variable.

      • encodeToInt

        public int encodeToInt(int var,
                       java.lang.Object val)
                throws PrismLangException
        Get the integer encoding of a value for a variable, specified as an Object. The Object is assumed to be of correct type (e.g. Integer, Boolean). Throws an exception if Object is of the wrong type.
        Throws:
        PrismLangException
